summary: Executive profile: Chief Executive with experience in presenting effectively, communicating, and managing cross-cultural teams. High-energy, results-oriented leader with entrepreneurial attitude. Demonstrated success in leadership, program development, fundraising, and strategic planning with measurable revenue growth and service expansion.

experience.title: President/Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: Oversaw administration of all programs; recruited and oriented Board members; provided funding and programmatic information to the Board; monitored program performance and ensured compliance with funding sources and accreditation; supervised budget and expenditures; directed funding proposals; recruited/hired/supervised executive staff; promoted staff development; established personnel policies; served as agency spokesperson; developed and maintained funding relationships.

experience.title: Executive Director (Ohio)
experience.description: Directed administration and supervision of the National Youth Advocate Program/Ohio; expanded and developed services responsive to community needs; developed policies and strategies; administered personnel policies; acted as state program spokesperson; achieved financial goals through sound budgeting and revenue management; planned and proposed annual budget; represented the program in board meetings as an ex-officio member.

experience.title: Assistant Director
experience.description: Managed day-to-day program service delivery in Franklin County; oversaw Foster Care, Clinical Services, and Sexual Offender services; advised on service utilization, staffing, promotions, transfers, and funding to meet performance goals; prepared and managed program budgets; supervised supervisors; coordinated training and supervision; reviewed case data and assisted in case assignments; ensured regular staff meetings and data-driven decision making.

experience.title: Child Welfare Caseworker
experience.description: Supervised staff; advised on policies and procedures for child welfare casework; assessed service needs and provided case direction; conducted hiring interviews; mentored other child welfare social workers; provided direct services including counseling, home visits, foster/relative placements, and linkage conferences; provided crisis intervention, attended court hearings, and supervised placement activities and transportation of children.

experience.title: Program Worker
experience.description: Under unit supervision, trained patients to achieve maximum independence in daily living skills; provided therapeutic crisis intervention; maintained clinical charts including care plans, medications, and incident reports; attended trainings and performed other direct care duties as assigned.

experience.title: Youth Leader
experience.description: Provided one-on-one and group supervision to children with severe behavioral problems; developed behavior modification plans to increase positive behaviors.
